Tour of the French Riviera from Monaco to Cannes, 21 April 2003

---The actual switch of guards---
---Moving off---
---New guard left in the guard box area---

---More of the castle---
---Johnnie and more of the castle. The flag flying proclaims the prince is in residence.---
---Obie at the castle and the guard walking duty---

---Looking from the castle to the one mile square area of Monaco---
---Yachts and boats are everywhere.---
---30,000 people live in the area. Citizens (only 5,000 residents are) live tax free, but to become a citizen is very, very difficult. You must live in Monaco at least half the year.---
